text: Anthony David Morphett (10 March 1938 â€“ 2 June 2018) was an Australian screenwriter. He created or co-created many Australian television series, including Dynasty, Certain Women. Sky Trackers, Blue Heelers, Water Rats, Above the Law and Rain Shadow. Morphett died in Katoomba, New South Wales of a heart attack on 2 June 2018 at the age of 80.Vale: Tony Morphett ==References== ==Other websites== * * Tony Morphett's web site Category:1938 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Australian screenwriters Category:Television writers Category:People from New South Wales
